featured.text: Girls’ names such as Faith, Patience, and Sophie (wisdom) are chosen because they symbolize Christian qualities.

definition.zh_def: 基督教徒，信奉基督教的人。
definition.en_def: A person who follows or adheres to Christianity, a monotheistic religion based on the life and teachings of Jesus Christ.
definition.example: She is a devoted Christian who attends church every Sunday.
